comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called DeSoto Automobiles / USA: 1929 - 1961, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 93187107@N00
comment._content:
LOVE these gorgeous cars! Had not seen one from 1935 until now tho. 

Curvy & streamlined at the same time....

[Digital libraries are the best!]
